renderFields.linkTemplate: ($this.attr(displayType); == "URL" and $this.attr(fieldTypePlainString); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "CURRENCY" and $this.attr(fieldTypeCurrency); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "PERCENT" and $this.attr(fieldTypePercent); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "DATE" and $this.attr(fieldTypeDate); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "TIME" and $this.attr(fieldTypeTime); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "DATETIME" and $this.attr(fieldTypeDateTime); == "link") or (($this.attr(displayType); == "EMAIL" or $this.attr(displayType); == "PHONE" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ENCRYPTEDSTRING" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ID") and $this.attr(fieldTypePlainString); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "STRING" and $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "link")
renderFields.linkTarget: ($this.attr(displayType); == "URL" and $this.attr(fieldTypePlainString); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "CURRENCY" and $this.attr(fieldTypeCurrency); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "PERCENT" and $this.attr(fieldTypePercent); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "DATE" and $this.attr(fieldTypeDate); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "TIME" and $this.attr(fieldTypeTime); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "DATETIME" and $this.attr(fieldTypeDateTime); == "link") or (($this.attr(displayType); == "EMAIL" or $this.attr(displayType); == "PHONE" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ENCRYPTEDSTRING" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ID") and $this.attr(fieldTypePlainString); == "link") or ($this.attr(displayType); == "STRING" and $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "link")
renderFields.defaultString: $this.attr(displayType); == "EMAIL" or $this.attr(displayType); == "PHONE" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ENCRYPTEDSTRING" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ID" or $this.attr(displayType); == "COMBOBOX" or $this.attr(displayType); == "PICKLIST" or $this.attr(displayType); == "STRING" or $this.attr(displayType); == "MULTIPICKLIST" or $this.attr(displayType); == "TEXTAREA" or $this.attr(displayType); == "REFERENCE" or $this.attr(displayType); == "URL"
renderFields.delimiter: $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "phone" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "ssn" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "tin" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "creditCard" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true
renderFields.blocks: $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "phone" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "ssn" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "tin" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeString); == "creditCard" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true
renderFields.numeralThousandsGroupStyle: $this.attr(fieldTypeCurrency); == "currency" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeNumber); == "currency" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true or $this.attr(fieldTypeNumber); == "range" and $this.attr(prettyInput); == true

renderSections.regex: $this.attr(displayType); == "CURRENCY" or $this.attr(displayType); == "PERCENT" or $this.attr(displayType); == "DATE" or $this.attr(displayType); == "TIME" or $this.attr(displayType); == "DATETIME" or $this.attr(displayType); == "DOUBLE" or $this.attr(displayType); == "INTEGER" or $this.attr(displayType); == "EMAIL" or $this.attr(displayType); == "PHONE" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ENCRYPTEDSTRING" or $this.attr(displayType); == "ID" or $this.attr(displayType); == "STRING"
